what_is_section.h2: What Is Tankless Water Heater Installation?
what_is_section.body: A tankless water heater is a type of water heating system that heats water only when needed, eliminating the need for a storage tank. This type of system is ideal for homes in Magna UT with multiple bathrooms or high water usage. Unlike traditional tank-style heaters, tankless systems are more energy-efficient and take up less space. They also reduce the risk of water damage from leaks and freezing pipes. In Magna UT's freeze-prone winters, a tankless system is a must-have for any homeowner.
